thread.section_title: Trade Tested Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trade Tested | www.tradetested.co.nz
thread.title: L Hesketh
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by L Hesketh

author: L Hesketh
title: L Hesketh
text:
We recently purchased some items from Trade Tested after a recommendation from a friend. Our purchase was at a very good price and arrived promptly and well packaged.
After we had sufficient time to use the items, I received an email from the general manager to check that I was happy with the product and service.
I can now confidently recommend Trade Tested to others
